title: The Drive
description: A typical American family on the verge of emotional collapse, take a vacation together to visit a secluded mountain Lodge resort in hopes of regaining the ties of a family bond that has been severed. Their holiday away to find each other soon becomes a struggle for their very survival when they are suddenly thrust into a wild and unpredictable land filled with unnatural and deadly threats at every turn. The question is no longer will they regain what they have lost from each other, but rather how will they survive, 'the drive'.
author: S.J. Johnson
